name: QUBIC: Complete Edition
description:
QUBIC Complete Edition is a retro-like turn-based maze game in which your task is to solve the labyrinth, collect the stars to unlock next level, avoid enemies/traps. Which includes all previosly released DLC / Level Packs that are not included in original QUBIC.

Key features:
  • More than 100 different levels that will blow your brain!
  • Mad retro-like 16bit pixel graphics!
  • Fast turn-based game-play!
  • Simple controls and bright colorful visual style.
  • Awesome brand new original soundtracks included.
Minimum system requirements:

50MB disk space, 256MB RAM, Keyboard & mouse
PC: Windows 7+, 1.6GHz+ x86-compatible processor, 512 Mb RAM, 512 Mb video card recommended 
MAC: OS X x64 version, Intel Core Duo 2.0GHz+, 1 Gb RAM, 1 Gb video card recommended 
Linux: Ubuntu 16.04+ or SteamOS , 1.6GHz or faster processor, 512 Mb RAM, 512 Mb video card recommended

Performance may vary on older/slower machines.
